name: Amalan International Pte Ltd
description: Operator of debt management programs intended to leverage affordable loan restructuring systems in cooperation with lenders. The company focuses on debt negotiations, providing financial literacy, and designing debt repayment plans, enabling clients to pay out debts in a timely manner and avoid penalties and high-interest rates.
